questions.quote: So, it's actually gotten to you? You're playing right into his hands!
George doesn't work. He's a bum. That's why he lives at home with us.
Mr. Lippman, when I worked for you at Pendent Publishing, I believed in you, you know as a man of integrity. But, I saw you in that paper hat and that aprin...
Yeah. Hey, you're not working this weekend, why don't you come down?
What can I do? Break up with him? Tell him, "I don't think we're right for each other." He's a guy! At least with a woman, there's a precendent. You know, the relationship goes sour, you end it.
Jerry wake up to reality. It's a military thing. They're probably creating a whole army of pig warriors.
Ok, now listen, I don't want any scenes in here like the last time.
Well how could you just play your message in front of anybody?
So, basically George the job here is quite simple. Selling bras.
Jerry! I'm *sure* I've seen men on the street early in the morning.
